results.name: Warm Palette
results.detail: R >= G >= B on all zone backgrounds

results.name: Font Trinity
results.detail: 4 fonts: Inter, JetBrains Mono, Instrument Serif, monospace. Note: monospace is generic fallback, 3 real families.

results.name: Border Hierarchy
results.detail: Found 3.75px/3px/0.75px, expected 4px/3px/1px. Builder used non-standard border widths.

results.name: Single Margin
results.detail: FALSE POSITIVE: 240px marginLeft/Right on .container from auto centering (960px container in 1440px viewport). Not a design margin.

results.name: Empty Containers
results.detail: 4 empty boundary divs (boundary-z1-z2 through boundary-z4-z5). These are zone boundary separators — intentional.

results.name: Semantic HTML
results.detail: 7 semantic tag types (header, main, section, footer, details, summary, blockquote)

results.name: Container Count
results.detail: 7 containers with 940-960px max-width (one per zone + global)

results.name: Component Usage
results.detail: 6 component types (callout:21, pull-quote:2, blockquote:7, table:7, details:6, comparison:3)

results.name: Multi-Coherence
results.detail: Z3→Z4 boundary has only 1 channel shift (background). Other boundaries: 3 channels each.

results.name: Heading Hierarchy
results.detail: h2→h4 skip at 'Traditional Approach' and 'Use Gas Town When' (should be h3)

results.name: WCAG Contrast
results.detail: 48 failures. Worst: header meta text (10-11px, 3.03 ratio), subtitle (15px, 3.03 ratio). Min 4.5:1 needed for normal text.

results.name: DPR Validation
results.detail: ENV: DPR 0.667 (Retina Mac MCP limitation). Workaround: viewport set to 960x600 physical = 1440x900 CSS. Layout rendering correct.

notes: GR-05 is borderline — monospace is a CSS generic family, not a distinct typeface
GR-15 is a false positive — 240px margins are auto centering, not design spacing
GR-19 empty boundary divs are intentional zone separators
GR-50 Z3→Z4 transition weakness: dark factory floor to light assembly line only shifts background
GR-60 contrast failures concentrated in header metadata and subtitle text — likely needs color/size adjustment
